conbody.p: This document provides a reference for charging data records (CDRs) and event data records (EDRs) in Smart
Plan Suite (SPS). SPS is available for both VNF and CNF platforms.
conbody.note: The content of sections 2.2-2.6 and chapter 3 is only relevant for NCC-VNF. Rest of the chapters are common for both VNF and CNF versions.
